Q_DESC:
Write a program that checks whether a given number is an Armstrong number or not. An Armstrong number is the one in which the sum of cubes of its digit is equal to the number itself. 
The program takes a number as input and output whether the given number is an Armstrong number or not. 
For example:
(a) 371 is an Armstrong Number as 27+343+1=371 
(b) 153 is an Armstrong Number (1+125+27=153) 
(c) 42 is not an Armstrong Number (64+8=72)
